Welcome to Fuzzster!

This fuzzy matching tool is based on the Levenshtein string distance ratio

This tool was build using Go for the backend API part and Javascript with Webpack for the frontend client part. Checkout the Github repository

If you need to fuzzy match large chunks of data, use the API

If you are fine with fuzzy matching chunks of data that fit max. 10 000 chars, start matching
